english.segment1: I stand with a blank expression now. and I can't believe myself. will someone tell me how. did I get here. I am walking. changing slowly. I am chasing. climbing closer
english.segment2: I know that I'll never be alone. you will never let me go. you are my anchor. hold my hand. while I'm sinking in the sand. no one else could understand. you are my anchor
english.segment3: it seems that I lost track of time. and I can't believe my mind. would you save me if. I reached out to you. I'm WAITING, watching, standing. I am reaching. climbing closer
english.segment4: I know that I'll never be alone. you will never let me go. you are my anchor. hold my hand. while I'm sinking in the sand. no one else could understand. you are my anchor yeah. anchor yeah. anchor yeah
english.segment5: I am walking. changing slowly. I am chasing. climbing closer
english.segment6: I know that I'll never be alone. you will never let me go. you are my anchor. hold my hand. while I'm sinking in the sand. no one else could understand. you are my anchor yeah. anchor yeah. anchor yeah
english.segment7: can you hear me. hear me. can you hear me
